privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We care about protecting your personal data. This policy explains what data is processed by the plugin, for what purpose and what your rights are.

responsable.title: Data Controller
responsable.body: The data controller is the publisher of the Link Fixer plugin. This plugin runs within your WordPress site and does not collect data without your action.

data.title: Data processed
data.p1: When scanning links, the plugin processes URLs, HTTP response statuses (e.g., 200, 404, redirects), locations where links are found (posts, pages, menus, widgets) and verification timestamps.
data.p2: If you enable PDF export or email sending (if available in your plan), the information required for these features is also used to generate and deliver reports.

purposes.title: Purposes and legal basis
purposes.body: Data is processed to identify broken links and improve your site quality (legitimate interest in proper operation and maintenance of the site).

retention.title: Retention
retention.body: Scan history (if enabled) is stored locally in your WordPress installation according to your settings. You can purge it at any time from the plugin interface.

sharing.title: Sharing and transfers
sharing.body: Data processed by the plugin remains in your WordPress environment. No data is shared with third parties unless you explicitly choose to use external services (payments, emails) under their terms.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
list: Right of access to your data
rights.outro: To exercise your rights, use the contact details provided by the plugin publisher.
